Name: LyraVR
About the game: LyraVR is a music creation app that offers everyone a fun and unique music-making experience. Compose your music in 3D space with virtual reality. Experiment and play with your compositions like never before. Create intricate loops and hand place your sounds. Control, weave and sculpt music sequences with ease. Perform your creations in real-time and pioneer a radical new form of sound art. Features Create interactive soundscapes with LyraVRâ€™s unique spatial music sequencer 5 Virtual instrument controllers from keyboards to drum pads Connect together 15 kinds of instrument nodes to compose musical sequences 3D spatial audio support for an immersive auditory experience 6 Environments Perform and record your set with third person spectator cam Import/Export/Record WAV Includes royalty-free pro samples from Loopmasters
